name: XRReferenceSpaceEvent.referenceSpace
description: The read-only XRReferenceSpaceEvent property referenceSpace specifies the reference space which is the originator of the event.
content:
Secure context
This feature is available only in secure contexts (HTTPS), in some or all supporting browsers.

The read-only XRReferenceSpaceEvent property referenceSpace specifies the reference space which is the originator of the event.
